title: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
description: When attempting to connect to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view and creating a dataset, the column icons are not displayed as expected.
OB: When creating a dataset in the Edit Data Set window after setting up a Derby database Data Source, the column icons are not displayed.
EB: I expect that when creating a dataset in the Edit Data Set window after setting up a Derby database Data Source, the column icons should be displayed, allowing me to easily manage and edit the dataset's columns.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select 'Query.'
6. Observe that the column icons are not displayed as expected.
